players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso and I'm going to lynch them."
Charlie: "I'm innocent, and I think Bob is the mafioso. He accused me of being suspicious when I was just following my instincts as the mafioso."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
